rules_text:
This enchantment enters with twice X time counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent mills cards equal to the number of time counters on this enchantment. Then remove two time counters from it. If there are no time counters on this enchantment, sacrifice it and it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of creature cards in that player’s graveyard.
notes: 2.2.0: Doubled the amount it mills. X = 5 will mill a total of 30 cards, but over 5 turns so I’m fine with that.
